title: Kog'Maw funny idea
body:
Riot should give kog'maws passive and 200% scaling but make that the only AP scaling in his kit. That would be crackup.

"Report Kog intentional feed"
"Bruh, its the new rework... Suicide Squad Kog OP"

{{champion:96}}

replies.body: So what your saying is give kog maws passive damage scale off of 200% AP?

Everyone would just save their flash for when he dies lol.

500 AP, 2.0 AS and a 1K BOOM!
